post.title: fs - bnib apple iphone 3gs - 16gb white - $500
post.content: i have brand new apple iphone 3gs - 16gb white ones for sale. it was purchased just over a month ago so it still has full warranty for almost a year. it's locked to rogers and box has never been opened (still in the box rogers shipped) i am downtown (bay/bloor) during the day and yonge/finch in the evening. contact me via email or phone (leave message if no answer) 416-268-6396 price is firm @ 500 will not ship so don't ask. no trade
